max_nesting._comment: 0 is the main loop's {}, gives the value of max nesting that might occur in the generated program

split_nesting._comment: 0 is an exact copy paste, gives the amount of transferred nesting

ifElse_nesting._comment: Specifies if if-else statements needs to be taken care off. 0 includes no changes

threading._comment: Specifies if threading should be used to optimise the code

staticMemory._comment: Specifies if variables may be manipulated and set into static memory of the processed code
